field_value: Silliker Australia Pty. Ltd., trading as MÃ©rieux NutriSciences, is a provider of scientific and testing services. Forming part of the global Silliker group, the Australian business mainly provides microbiological and chemical testing of food products, therapeutic goods, toiletries, cosmetics, dairy products, water and environmental products. The company also offers a range of consulting services to the food industry, in addition to certification audits and general consulting. Silliker Australia is headquartered in the Melbourne suburb of Blackburn, Victoria, and has additional offices and laboratories located in Sydney, Brisbane and Perth.Food Safety and Quality MÃ©rieux NutriSciences offers a full portfolio of contract research services to ensure the quality and safety of foods from concept development to retail shelf. It provides testing, auditing, consulting, training, and research services â€” all of which can be customized to meet the needs of manufacturers, food processors, caterers and retailers. Its services in this area include food testing, water testing, environmental testing (of food production facilities etc), contract research, safety and quality consulting, sensory and consumer research, labelling and regulatory services, data management and audits and inspections.Water and EnvironmentThe company can provide services including sampling and analysing of surface and ground water, leachates, soils, sediments, sludge, solid waste, liquid and gaseous effluents as well as stack emissions. Its portfolio includes 1,200 types of physical, physicochemical, chemical, microbiological, toxicological and ecotoxicological analyses. It also offers waste management services. Activities in the Water and Environment segment are divided into water testing, air testing, waste testing and technical support.Pharma and Medical DevicesMÃ©rieux NutriSciences provides research, development and quality control testing of pharmaceutical products and medical devices. It offers a full range of analytical and research services, spanning safety and quality control, development and validation of analytical methods, pharmaceutical equivalence, bioanalytical testing and others.Personal Care and CosmeticsMÃ©rieux NutriSciences offers testing and analytical services to support the development of new personal care and cosmetic products, including ingredients, skin products, deodorants, personal care products, makeup, oral care and fragrances. It provides services in quality control and efficacy and claim support.Digital SolutionsThe company provides software for supply chain and data management, with specialised platforms for environmental monitoring and quality monitoring, and a series of free webinars on food safety, quality and supply chain issues.The global company also has product lines for agrochemicals, consumer goods and biofortis innovation services, however, these are not presently available in Australia.
